tool.name: pl.ranking

configfiles.configfile:
import scanpy.api as sc @CMD_set_figure_params @CMD_read_inputs
sc.pl.ranking( adata = '$adata', attr = '$attr', keys = '$keys',)

param.name: attr
param.label: attr
param.help: The attribute of AnnData that contains the score.

param.name: keys
param.label: keys
param.help: The scores to look up an array from the attribute of adata.

data.name: Returns matplotlib gridspec with access to the axes.
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: Returns matplotlib gridspec with access to the axes.

output.name: Returns matplotlib gridspec with access to the axes.

tool.help:
Plot rankings.
See, for example, how this is used in pl.pca_ranking.
Parameters ---------- adata : AnnData The data. attr : {'var', 'obs', 'uns', 'varm', 'obsm'} The attribute of AnnData that contains the score. keys : str or list of str The scores to look up an array from the attribute of adata.
Returns ------- Returns matplotlib gridspec with access to the axes.
